definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: And when the morning arose, they were sent away with their asses.
sentences.chinese: 清早天一發亮，就遣送這些人帶着他們的驢走了。

sentences.english: There's a boy in flared pants and a yellow short-sleeved shirt.
sentences.chinese: 一個男孩穿一條發亮的褲子和黃色短袖衫。

sentences.english: He smothers his hair with grease, eg hair-oil.
sentences.chinese: 他的頭髮因塗了油而發亮。

sentences.english: The blade glows blue when Orcs are close.
sentences.chinese: 半獸人接近劍身就會發亮。

sentences.english: Did you see the way her eyes sparkled? She's so hsoftwarey.
sentences.chinese: 你們看到她閃閃發亮的眼神了嗎？她很開心。

sentences.english: Her golden hair flared like the sun.
sentences.chinese: 她那金色的頭髮像陽光般熠熠發亮。
它們在燭光中油光發亮。

sentences.english: Glaze the pie with beaten egg.
sentences.chinese: 在餡餅上塗上打勻的蛋液使表面發亮。

sentences.english: Highly polished silver was displayed in gleaming glass cabinets;
sentences.chinese: 擦得發亮的銀器陳列在明亮的玻璃櫃裏。

sentences.english: Did you see the way her eyes sparkled?
sentences.chinese: 你們看到她閃閃發亮的眼神了嗎？

sentences.english: He shone his leather shoes up till they gleamed.
sentences.chinese: 他把自己的皮鞋擦得閃閃發亮。

sentences.english: And so she sat down at a big shiny table and began to draw.
sentences.chinese: 然後，它坐在一個張閃閃發亮的桌子旁開始畫畫。

sentences.english: Shall not the light of the wicked be extinguished, and the flame of his fire not shine?
sentences.chinese: 惡人的光必要熄滅，他的火炎必不發亮。

sentences.english: But Merson says it is Arsenal's youngsters who will shine.
sentences.chinese: 但默森表示阿森納的年輕人將會發光發亮。

sentences.english: Maggie smiled, her long black hair flowing and almost glowing with sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 瑪吉口露微笑，她的頭髮細長而柔順，烏黑而發亮。

sentences.english: The dog tracked mud all over the shiny kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 狗在廚房發亮的地板上留下一屋子泥。

definition: Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
to illuminate/to turn on the lights/to light (a blaze)
